str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
More, rather. Neuter of the comparative of the same as malista; more) or rather.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To place (put) to, add; I do again. From pros and tithemi; to place additionally, i.e. Lay beside, annex, repeat.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
A multitude, crowd, great number, assemblage. From pletho; a fulness, i.e. A large number, throng, populace.
And, both. A primary particle of connection or addition; both or also.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
